document.full_text: fighting has erupted between government forces and rebel groups in sudan's darfur region, rebels and u.n. peacekeepers said on tuesday, days after peace talks stalled over a planned referendum.
document.title: clashes erupt in darfur as peace talks stall
lines_and_colors: fighting has erupted between government forces and rebel groups in sudan's darfur region, rebels and u.n. peacekeepers said on tuesday, days after peace talks stalled over a planned referendum.
